Description: Allows the logged in to specify the User needed to be  defined as Account Manager
Action: Select User Name of the Account  Manager

Description: Determines the Account Manager Type: •  All Account Managers: allowing the user to search  for all defined account managers. •  Only Roots: allowing the user to search only for the  account managers representing roots for other  accounts. •  Sub Accounts: allowing the user to search only for  the account managers representing sub accounts for  other roots
Action: Select the corresponding Account  Manager Type
